law.catch_line: At the request of the Attorney General acting under § 9.5-315 of this subtitle, a law enforcement o...
law.text: At the request of the Attorney General acting under § 9.5-315 of this subtitle, a law enforcement officer may take any lawful action reasonably necessary to locate a child or a party and assist the Attorney General with responsibilities under § 9.5-315 of this subtitle.
